name: recallai
description: AI-powered conversation recall and knowledge management system

scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:electron
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:electron"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:electron
scripts.dist: npm run build && npm run dist:electron
scripts.pack:win: npm run build && cd electron && npm run build:win
scripts.pack:mac: npm run build && cd electron && npm run build:mac
scripts.pack:linux: npm run build && cd electron && npm run build:linux
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/dist electron/dist node_modules frontend/node_modules electron/node_modules

author: Your Name
